item.title: Version 1.1.15
item.description:
What’s New in Version 1.1.15+42 Smarter Search: Quickly find operators and deals by name, code, ID, or alliance. Improved Deal Details: See short partner codes, with full names available via info icon. Mobile App Scenarios: Admins can set custom scenarios, making app data more flexible than the web dashboard. Sorted Announcements & News: Latest updates now appear at the top.
Fixes & Enhancements 1.Scenario changes apply across all pages. 2.Duplicate deals removed from search. 3.Alliance name search works correctly.

item.title: Version 1.1.14
item.description: What’s New in Version 1.1.14+41 1. The tax treatment message is now shown the same way for both inbound and outbound 2. The app now separates commitments into Inbound and Outbound. Each section will show only the relevant charges for: * Incremental Charge Commitment * Bundle Commitment * Commitment * Over-commitment * All inbound services (Voice, SMS, GPRS) are grouped and shown under Inbound 3. On the Deal Details page, all dates now follow the YYYY-MM format.
